name: Abris
intro: Curated NFT marketplace built on Algorand Blockchain
introduce: Abris is a curated NFT marketplace enables innovative creators around the world to showcase their creativity as NFTs and empower them to market their assets with no boundaries. Abris empowers the Artists, Celebrities, Galleries, Charities, Photographers, Companies and all other innovative creators to have a custom store front and enables them to mint, sell and buy their digital assets globally.
